name: Nonneg.coe_smul
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
𝕜' : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : OrderedSemiring 𝕜
inst✝ : SMul 𝕜 𝕜'
a : Subtype fun c => LE.le 0 c
x : 𝕜'
⊢ Eq (HSMul.hSMul (↑a) x) (HSMul.hSMul a x)
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
lemma coe_smul (a : 𝕜≥0) (x : 𝕜') : (a : 𝕜) • x = a • x :=
  rfl

name: Nonneg.mk_smul
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
𝕜' : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : OrderedSemiring 𝕜
inst✝ : SMul 𝕜 𝕜'
a : 𝕜
ha : LE.le 0 a
x : 𝕜'
⊢ Eq (HSMul.hSMul ⟨a, ha⟩ x) (HSMul.hSMul a x)
decl:
@[simp]
lemma mk_smul (a) (ha) (x : 𝕜') : (⟨a, ha⟩ : 𝕜≥0) • x = a • x :=
  rfl

name: Nonneg.instIsScalarTower
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
𝕜' : Type u_2
E : Type u_3
inst✝⁴ : OrderedSemiring 𝕜
inst✝³ : SMul 𝕜 𝕜'
inst✝² : SMul 𝕜 E
inst✝¹ : SMul 𝕜' E
inst✝ : IsScalarTower 𝕜 𝕜' E
⊢ IsScalarTower (Subtype fun c => LE.le 0 c) 𝕜' E
decl:
instance instIsScalarTower : IsScalarTower 𝕜≥0 𝕜' E :=
  SMul.comp.isScalarTower ↑Nonneg.coeRingHom

name: Nonneg.instOrderedSMul
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
E : Type u_3
inst✝² : OrderedSemiring 𝕜
inst✝¹ : OrderedAddCommMonoid E
inst✝ : SMulWithZero 𝕜 E
hE : OrderedSMul 𝕜 E
⊢ OrderedSMul (Subtype fun c => LE.le 0 c) E
decl:
instance instOrderedSMul : OrderedSMul 𝕜≥0 E :=
  ⟨hE.1, hE.2⟩
